sourcesContent: import { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import Prism from 'prismjs' import BreadCrumbs from '@Components/breadcrumbs' import Card from '@Components/card-snippet' import BadgeContextual from './BadgeContextual' import BadgeIcons from './BadgeIcons' import BadgeLink from './BadgeLink' import BadgeBlock from './BadgeBlock' import BadgeGlow from './BadgeGlow' import BadgeLight from './BadgeLight' import { badgeContextual, badgeGlow, badgeLight, badgeIcons, badgeLink, badgeBlock } from './BadgeSourceCode' const Badges = () => { useEffect(() => { Prism.highlightAll() }, []) return ( Use prop color with Badge tag to create badge with different colors. Use class badge-glow with Badge tag to add glow effect to your badge Use prop color="light-COLOR_NAME" with Badge tag to create badge with different colors. Use href="#" prop to use badge as a link. Use .d-block class to make badge display as block. ) } export default Badges
